routes.name: Home
routes.title: PixelVivid - Home
routes.description: PixelVivid offers a wide varity of products and services, including custom painted sunglasses, stock photography, touchup services, and more.

routes.name: About Us
routes.title: PixelVivid - About us
routes.description: PixelVivid, born during the COVID Pandemic, gives old boring sunglasses a second life, with bold vivid colors and an array of styles unique to each customer.
routes.keywords: PixelVivid, about us, Brian Whaley, Mary Ann Sarao, creative upcycling, sustainability, small business, stock photography, custom painted sunglasses
